title: Steganography Distortion Learning Using Generative Images

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A short intensive course optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning environments, featuring practice-centered education based on the GIFDL concept

learning_goals: Explain steganography embedding principles utilizing the variation characteristics of generated images.
Perform image embedding experiments by applying a GAN-based distortion learning model.
Quantitatively evaluate the security performance of a generative image-based steganography system.
Design lightweight steganography techniques implementable in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
